name: Daily Essential T-Shirt (SMTS-001)
description: The foundation of your rotation. Made from premium 100% cotton for a comfortable, everyday fit. Featuring the classic Seedhe Maut logo.

name: Danger 11K Volts T-Shirt (SMTS-010)
description: High voltage energy. Custom graphic 'Danger 11K Volts' print on a heavyweight cotton boxy-fit tee.

name: Iconic Gaming Pad (SMGP-001) – Limited Edition
description: Level up your setup. High-density surface for precision tracking, featuring SMX signature branding.

name: Drinks Tumbler With Straw (SMDT-001)
description: Stay hydrated during the set. Insulated tumbler with a reusable straw, finished with matte black branding.

name: SMX 2025 Tour T-Shirt (SMTS-007)
description: Official SMX World Tour merchandise. Features full tour dates and exclusive artwork on a charcoal washed heavyweight tee.

name: SMX Acid Washed Tour T-Shirt (SMTS-008)
description: Vintage look, modern performance. Acid-washed finish with distressed tour graphics for a lived-in feel.

name: SMX Pattern T-Shirt (SMTS-005)
description: All-over SMX monogram pattern. Premium sublimation print on a breathable cotton-blend fabric.

name: SMX Pattern Polo Shirt (SMTS-006)
description: Sophisticated street gear. SMX monogram collar and chest embroidery on a custom-knit polo.

name: SMX Limited Edition Mask / Snood (SMSN-002)
description: Multi-functional performance gear. Can be worn as a mask, neck gaiter, or headband. High-stretch moisture-wicking fabric.

name: SMX Pattern Silk Bandana (SMBD-001)
description: Luxury finish. 100% silk bandana with intricate SMX pattern. Perfect for your hair, neck, or kit.

name: Bayaan 12″ Picture Disk Signed Vinyl (SMVI-002)
description: The classic that started it all. Limited edition picture disk signed by Encore ABJ and Calm. Features full album artwork.

name: Nayaab 12″ Picture Disk Signed Vinyl (SMVI-004)
description: The magnum opus. Ultra-limited picture disk signed by the duo. A True masterpiece for the collection.

name: Jersey Top - Encore
description: Official SMFC Performance Kit. 'Encore' edition with custom player number and breathable mesh panels.

name: Jersey Top - Calm
description: Official SMFC Performance Kit. 'Calm' edition featuring specialized cooling tech and the signature SMFC crest.

name: TBSM Official Football
description: Match-ready. Professional grade football with TBSM signature branding and high-retention bladder.

name: Into Battle 2025 – A2 Art Print (SMPR-001)
description: Limited edition tour art. Printed on 300gsm metallic finish paper. A piece of tour history for your walls.

name: Official Seedhe Maut Wallpapers
description: Equip your digital devices with high-res SM artwork. Perfect for desktop and mobile.
